metadata.title: CVE-2020-25860 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: The install.c module in the Pengutronix RAUC update client prior to version 1.5 has a Time-of-Check Time-of-Use vulnerability, where signature verification on an update file takes place before the file is reopened for installation. An attacker who can modify the update file just before it is reopened can install arbitrary code on the device.

criterions.comment: rauc package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
